attributes.additional_details: Hard working people now must to choose between putting food on a table or heating their houses. Those energy companies are making highest profits for 100 years. This need to stop.
attributes.background: To stop increase of energy bills

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Reinstate the two year energy price guarantee: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/625700

Subsidise energy and fuel prices to mitigate cost increases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/622530
